Uses of Interface
api.node_data

  • Packages that use node_data 
    Package Description
    api  

    • Uses of node_data in api

      Methods in api that return node_data 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      node_data directed_weighted_graph.getNode​(int key)
      returns the node_data by the node_id,
      node_data directed_weighted_graph.removeNode​(int key)
      Deletes the node (with the given ID) from the graph - and removes all edges which starts or ends at this node.
      Methods in api that return types with arguments of type node_data 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Collection<node_data> directed_weighted_graph.getV()
      This method returns a pointer (shallow copy) for the collection representing all the nodes in the graph.
      java.util.List<node_data> dw_graph_algorithms.shortestPath​(int src, int dest)
      returns the the shortest path between src to dest - as an ordered List of nodes: src--> n1-->n2-->...dest see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shortest_path_problem Note if no such path --> returns null;
      Methods in api with parameters of type node_data 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void directed_weighted_graph.addNode​(node_data n)
      adds a new node to the graph with the given node_data.
